languages.text: "Волки не ждут чужих указаний. Мы чтим старый уклад, а не Кодекс Астартес. Воюем стаями, нас учат и врачуют мудрые жрецы. Вместо лавров мы носим страшащие демонов маски, храним старую веру, владеем чарами Фенриса и носим прозвища, обладающие магической силой. Таковы мы!"

"The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"
languages.original_text: "Волки не ждут чужих указаний. Мы чтим старый уклад, а не Кодекс Астартес. Воюем стаями, нас учат и врачуют мудрые жрецы. Вместо лавров мы носим страшащие демонов маски, храним старую веру, владеем чарами Фенриса и носим прозвища, обладающие магической силой. Таковы мы!"

traits.locale_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise priests. Instead of laurels, we wear daemon-frightening masks, we keep the old face, we wield the spells of Fenris, and we bear names imbued with magic power. This is who we are!"

"The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise priests. Instead of laurels, we wear daemon-frightening masks, we keep the old face, we wield the spells of Fenris, and we bear names imbued with magic power. This is who we are!"

"The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise priests. Instead of laurels, we wear daemon-frightening masks, we keep the old face, we wield the spells of Fenris, and we bear names imbued with magic power. This is who we are!"

"The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

languages.text: “狼群从不受外来者指挥。我们遵循的并不是阿斯塔特圣典，而是我们古老的传统与习俗。我们成群结队地战斗，在贤明的野狼祭司的指引下接受训练，得到治疗。我们不会把桂冠戴在头上，纪念我们的荣耀。相反，我们会把逝去兄弟的全名刻在墓碑上，以此作为复仇的承诺，从中汲取力量！”
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: “狼群从不接受外来者的命令。我们遵循的并不是阿斯塔特圣典，而是我们古老的传统与习俗。我们成群结队地战斗，在贤明牧师的指引下接受训练，得到治疗。我们戴的不是桂冠，而是连恶魔都会感到恐惧的面具。我们依然保留着古老的面目，我们施展着芬里斯的法术，我们的名字被赋予了魔法的力量。这就是我们！”

languages.text: «Los lobos no aceptan órdenes de forasteros. Seguimos las antiguas normas, no el Codex Astartes. Luchamos en jaurías y recibimos entrenamiento y curación de nuestros sabios sacerdotes lobos y rúnicos. No nos cubrimos de laureles, sino que tallamos los nombres completos de nuestros hermanos caídos como promesa de venganza. ¡Y esa promesa es la que nos da fuerzas!».
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: «Los lobos no aceptan órdenes de forasteros. Seguimos las antiguas normas, no el Codex Astartes. Luchamos en jaurías y recibimos entrenamiento y curación de nuestros sabios sacerdotes. No llevamos laureles, sino máscaras espantadaemons. Mantenemos nuestro antiguo aspecto, manejamos los hechizos de Fenris y llevamos nombres imbuidos con poder mágico. ¡Es lo que somos!».

languages.text: 「狼はよそ者の命令を聞かない。俺達は<戦いの聖典>は無視して、古いやり方を守っている。群れで戦って、賢いルーンプリーストと牙狼法師が俺達を鍛え、癒してくれるんだ。ローレルで体を飾って何になる。代わりに、復讐を誓って死んだ同族の苗字も名前も刻み、その誓いから力を溢れさせているのさ！」
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: 「狼は部外者の指図は受けない。〈戦いの聖典〉ではなく、古き流儀を守るのだ。群れで戦い 賢明な司祭によって訓練され、ローレルの代わりにディーモンを畏怖させる仮面をかぶり、古き面影を残し、フェンリスの呪文を操り、魔力を宿した名を冠する。これこそが我々なのだ！」

languages.text: "Die Wolves nehmen keine Befehle von Außenstehenden an. Wir folgen den alten Traditionen, nicht dem Codex Astartes. Wir kämpfen in Rudeln und werden von unseren weisen Runen- und Wolfspriestern ausgebildet und geheilt. Wir finden keine Ehre darin, uns mit Lorbeeren zu schmücken, sondern ritzen stattdessen die vollständigen Namen unserer gefallenen Brüder als Racheversprechen ein und ziehen Kraft aus diesem Versprechen!"
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Wolves nehmen keine Befehle von Außenstehenden an. Wir folgen den alten Traditionen, nicht dem Codex Astartes. Wir kämpfen in Rudeln und werden von unseren weisen Priestern ausgebildet und geheilt. Statt Lorbeeren tragen wir Masken, welche Dämonen ängstigen. Wir behalten das alte Gesicht, wir wirken die Zauber von Fenris und wir tragen Namen, in denen magische Kraft liegt. Das sind wir!"

languages.text: « Les Loups ne reçoivent pas d'ordre des étrangers. Nous préférons nos traditions ancestrales au Codex Astartes. Nous nous battons en meute et sommes entraînés et soignés par nos sages Prêtre des Runes et des Loups. Au lieu de nous tresser des lauriers, nous gravons les noms complets de nos défunts frères comme une promesse de vengeance dans laquelle nous puisons notre force ! »
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: « Les Space Wolves ne reçoivent pas d'ordre venus des autres. Nous préférons nos traditions ancestrales au Codex Astartes. Nous nous battons en meute, et sommes entraînés et soignés par nos prêtres sages. Au lieu de lauriers, nous portons des masques qui font peur aux démons, nous maintenons les traditions, nous manions les sortilèges de Fenris et nous nous affublons de noms imprégnés de puissance magique. Voilà qui nous sommes ! »

languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

languages.text: "Kurtlar yabancılardan emir almaz. Eski düzeni sürdürürüz, Astartes Kanunnamesi'ne uymaya çalışmayız. Sürüler hâlinde savaşır; bilge Rün ve Kurt Rahiplerimizce eğitilip iyileştiriliriz. Kendimizi defne dallarıyla süslemek yerine şehit kardeşlerimizin tam adını üzerimize kazırız. Bizim için bu bir intikam yeminidir ve bize kudret veren de bu yemindir!"
languages.original_text: "The Wolves do not take orders from outsiders. We keep the old ways, not the Codex Astartes. We fight in packs, and we are trained and healed by our wise Rune and Wolf Priests. We do not find honour in adorning ourselves in laurels, but instead etch the full names of our fallen kin as a promise of vengeance and draw strength from that promise!"

traits.locale_text: "Kurtlar yabancılardan emir almaz. Eski düzeni sürdürürüz, Kodeks Astartes'e uymaya çalışmayız. Sürüler hâlinde savaşırız ve bilge Rünümüz ile Kurt Rahipler tarafından eğitilir ve tedavi ediliriz. Kendimizi defne dallarıyla süslemek yerine intikam sözü vermek için düşmüş kardeşlerimizin adını kazırız ve bu sözden güç alırız!"
